name: Citadale - Prelude to War
description:
Go retro in this bite-sized adventure!

Before there was the eternal war between the dark lord Rhogul and the heroic Dorleac clan, Citadale island was already teeming with monsters. In a place as dangerous as this no-one would dare venture very far. Thus Reiyk, the half-god-half-devil son of Rhogul, decided to entomb the immortal remains of his father deep within the castle.

To do this he first needs to cleanse the island of all demonic influence, lest his father might attract a following of the undead kind. Lucky for Reiyk he got help: YOU!

------------------------------------

  • Retro Handheld styled demon-slaying action
  • Old-school password system
  • Six stages filled with creatures of the night
  • 8-Bit chiptune soundtrack
  • 4 visual modes representing 4 major handhelds of the early 90s
  • Various secrets and passwords to uncover
  • This is a prequel to Citadale - Gate of Souls
